welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Huntington, a charming city known for its friendly locals, beautiful parks, and rich history. Get ready to explore and experience all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to many major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is known for its modern design and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest at JFK and serves a mix of domestic and international flights, as well as many low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is home to JetBlue and primarily serves domestic and international flights to the Caribbean and Latin America.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights and is known for its upscale shopping and dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal is the newest at JFK and serves primarily international flights for American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login and have limited free access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

wifi.note: Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access free WiFi.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport offers domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
